58 rs_trace_fn_t *rs_trace_impl = rs_trace_stderr;
59 
60 int rs_trace_level = RS_LOG_INFO;
61 
62 #ifdef HAVE_PROGRAM_INVOCATION_NAME
63 # define MY_NAME program_invocation_short_name
64 #else
65 # define MY_NAME "librsync"
66 #endif
67 
68 static void rs_log_va(int level, char const *fn, char const *fmt, va_list va);
69 
70 #if SIZEOF_SIZE_T > SIZEOF_LONG
71 # warning size_t is larger than a long integer, values in trace messages may be wrong
72 #endif
73 
74 
79 static const char *rs_severities[] = {
80  "EMERGENCY! ", "ALERT! ", "CRITICAL! ", "ERROR: ", "Warning: ",
81  "", "", ""
82 };
83 
84 
85 
96 void
97 rs_trace_to(rs_trace_fn_t * new_impl)
98 {
99  rs_trace_impl = new_impl;
100 }
101 
102 
106 void
107 rs_trace_set_level(rs_loglevel level)
108 {
109  rs_trace_level = level;
110 }
111 
112 
113 static void
114 rs_log_va(int flags, char const *fn, char const *fmt, va_list va)
115 {
116  int level = flags & RS_LOG_PRIMASK;
117 
118  if (rs_trace_impl && level <= rs_trace_level) {
119  char buf[1000];
120  char full_buf[1000];
121 
122  vsnprintf(buf, sizeof buf - 1, fmt, va);
123 
124  if (flags & RS_LOG_NONAME) {
125  snprintf(full_buf, sizeof full_buf - 1,
126  "%s: %s%s\n",
127  MY_NAME, rs_severities[level], buf);
128  } else {
129  snprintf(full_buf, sizeof full_buf - 1,
130  "%s: %s(%s) %s\n",
131  MY_NAME, rs_severities[level], fn, buf);
132  }
133 
134  rs_trace_impl(level, full_buf);
135  }
136 }
137 
138 
139 
144 void
145 rs_log0_nofn(int level, char const *fmt, ...)
146 {
147  va_list va;
148 
149  va_start(va, fmt);
150  rs_log_va(level, PACKAGE, fmt, va);
151  va_end(va);
152 }
153 
154 
155 /* Called by a macro that prepends the calling function name,
156  * etc. */
157 void
158 rs_log0(int level, char const *fn, char const *fmt, ...)
159 {
160  va_list va;
161 
162  va_start(va, fmt);
163  rs_log_va(level, fn, fmt, va);
164  va_end(va);
165 }
166 
167 
168 void
169 rs_trace_stderr(int UNUSED(level), char const *msg)
170 {
171  /* NOTE NO TRAILING NUL */
172  write(STDERR_FILENO, msg, strlen(msg));
173 }
174 
175 
176 /* This is called directly if the machine doesn't allow varargs
177  * macros. */
178 void
179 rs_fatal0(char const *s, ...)
180 {
181  va_list va;
182 
183  va_start(va, s);
184  rs_log_va(RS_LOG_CRIT, PACKAGE, s, va);
185  va_end(va);
186 }
187 
188 
189 /* This is called directly if the machine doesn't allow varargs
190  * macros. */
191 void
192 rs_error0(char const *s, ...)
193 {
194  va_list va;
195 
196  va_start(va, s);
197  rs_log_va(RS_LOG_ERR, PACKAGE, s, va);
198  va_end(va);
199 }
200 
201 
202 /* This is called directly if the machine doesn't allow varargs
203  * macros. */
204 void
205 rs_trace0(char const *s, ...)
206 {
207 #ifdef DO_RS_TRACE
208  va_list va;
209 
210  va_start(va, s);
211  rs_log_va(RS_LOG_DEBUG, PACKAGE, s, va);
212  va_end(va);
213 #endif /* !DO_RS_TRACE */
214 }
215 
216 
222 int
223 rs_supports_trace(void)
224 {
225 #ifdef DO_RS_TRACE
226  return 1;
227 #else
228  return 0;
229 #endif /* !DO_RS_TRACE */
230 }
